challenges.title: 2025 28-Day AI Challenge
challenges.description: Complete the 28-day AI challenge to enhance your skills.

challenges.title: 14-Day AI Side Gigs Challenge
challenges.description: Learn how to leverage AI for side gigs in just 14 days.

challenge_1.title: Day 1: Introduction to AI
challenge_1.description: Learn the basics of AI and its applications.
challenge_1.content: aaaa  Affiliate marketing is a type of performance-based marketing where a business rewards one or more affiliates for each visitor or customer brought by the affiliate's own marketing efforts.
